name: Elegant MicroWeb
description:
Elegant MicroWeb is a software products and services company with a vision of 'Delivering Value of Technology'. We have a successful track record of serving our customers across the globe, including the USA, UK, Europe, Japan, Southeast Asia, and India. With years of experience working with customers across the globe, we have practiced and refined our delivery models and product development practices.
Our vision is to simplify the use and deployment of technology while providing all the functional richness a user needs, in a stable technology environment.
We have years of experience working in many industries, for all types of clients, including small and medium enterprises (SMEs), software companies and web agencies. We have a deep and broad skill set, and a dedicated team of professionals, providing proven development processes. We provide excellent value and timely results, regardless of project complexity or length. We cater to the needs of clients across time zones, irrespective of technical, functional or cultural diversity.
We provide an array of software outsourcing services for Application Development & Maintenance, Mobile Applications Development, Product Development, and IT Consulting.
